title: amountbase
description: Base class for amount and issue

value.description: The quantity of the currency, denoted as a string to retain floating point precision

currency.description: The three-character code or hexadecimal string used to denote currencies, or "drops" for the smallest unit of BRT.

counterparty.description: The BRT Ledger address of the account that owes or is owed the funds (omitted if `currency` is "BRT" or "drops")
